DuplicateBorderException - Exception Class in main.java.utils.exceptions
The DuplicateBorderException class represents an exception that is thrown when attempting to add a duplicate border between two countries.
DuplicateBorderException(int, int) - Constructor for exception class main.java.utils.exceptions.DuplicateBorderException
Constructs a DuplicateBorderException with a detail message indicating that a border between the specified source and target countries already exists.
DuplicateContinentException - Exception Class in main.java.utils.exceptions
The DuplicateContinentException class represents an exception that is thrown when attempting to add a duplicate continent.
DuplicateContinentException(int) - Constructor for exception class main.java.utils.exceptions.DuplicateContinentException
Constructs a DuplicateContinentException with a detail message indicating that a continent with the specified ID already exists.
DuplicateContinentException(String) - Constructor for exception class main.java.utils.exceptions.DuplicateContinentException
Constructs a DuplicateContinentException with a detail message indicating that a continent with the specified name already exists.
DuplicateCountryException - Exception Class in main.java.utils.exceptions
The DuplicateCountryException class represents an exception that is thrown when attempting to add a duplicate country.
DuplicateCountryException(int) - Constructor for exception class main.java.utils.exceptions.DuplicateCountryException
Constructs a DuplicateCountryException with a detail message indicating that a country with the specified ID already exists.
DuplicateCountryException(String) - Constructor for exception class main.java.utils.exceptions.DuplicateCountryException
Constructs a DuplicateCountryException with a detail message indicating that a country with the specified name already exists.
